name: Time Shift Machina
description:
In the far distant future, humanity is on the brink of destruction. Giant monsters have risen from the depths of the earth and destroyed every major focal point of civilization.  The creatures multiplied quickly and now cover the globe wreaking destruction and havoc.  You are the last soldier equipped with a time-travelling mech you must go back to defeat the first monsters to rise from the depths before they multiply.

This game was originally made in 72 hours for Mini-Jam 81 Theme: Kaiju Limitation: Death is not the end

Programming, Design, and Sound Effects by Michael Williams - Bouncing Turtle
Awesome monster sprites made by myself, my wife, and my good friend Jesse Devlin.
Backgrounds by https://ansimuz.itch.io/
Music by https://clement-panchout.itch.io/ & https://timbeek.itch.io/
